news_header: At least twelve people were injured in Grenoble, France, when a grenade exploded in a bar on Wednesday night. Two individuals are in critical condition. An unknown assailant threw the grenade and fled, with many patrons present at the time.
news_original_title: Ranskan Grenoblessa baariin heitetty kranaatti räjähti – toistakymmentä haavoittui
news_text: The motive is unclear, but authorities do not consider it a terrorist act. Forensics are investigating a potential link to drug trafficking. The mayor condemned the violence.
